mapper.insert: insert into moim_role_tb(moim_role, moim_id, user_id) VALUES (#{moimRole}, #{moimId}, #{userId})
mapper.select: SELECT moim_role FROM moim_role_tb WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND moim_id = #{moimId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM moim_role_tb WHERE moim_id = #{moimId} AND user_id = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT mr.moim_role_id as moimRoleId, mr.moim_role as moimRole, mr.moim_id as moimId, mr.user_id as userId, u.nick_name as nickName, u.profile_img_path as profileImgPath FROM moim_role_tb mr JOIN user_tb u ON mr.user_id = u.user_id WHERE mr.moim_id = #{moimId} AND mr.user_id != #{userId} AND mr.moim_role = 'MEMBER'

SELECT mr.moim_role_id as moimRoleId, mr.moim_role as moimRole, mr.moim_id as moimId, mr.user_id as userId, u.nick_name as nickName, u.profile_img_path as profileImgPath FROM moim_role_tb mr JOIN user_tb u ON mr.user_id = u.user_id WHERE mr.moim_id = #{moimId} ORDER BY CASE WHEN mr.moim_role = 'OWNER' THEN 1 ELSE 2 END, u.nick_name
select exists ( select 1 from moim_role_tb mr join moim_tb m ON mr.moim_id = m.moim_id where mr.user_id = #{userId} and upper(trim(mr.moim_role)) = 'OWNER' )
